mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ship_status_tb (sh_status_id,sh_id, sh_status_latitude, sh_status_longitude) VALUES (#{sh_status_id}, #{sh_id}, #{sh_status_latitude}, #{sh_status_longitude})
INSERT INTO sensor_status_tb (sh_status_id, se_id, se_status) VALUES (#{sh_status_id}, #{se_id}, #{se_status})
mapper.select: ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sh.sh_status_id, sh.sh_id, ss.se_id, ss.se_status, sh.sh_status_latitude, sh.sh_status_longitude, sh.sh_status_date FROM ship_status_tb sh, sensor_status_tb ss WHERE sh.sh_status_id = ss.sh_status_id AND sh.sh_id= #{sh_id} ) PIVOT ( SUM(se_status) -- 집계함수 FOR se_id IN ( 1 as fire,2 as temperature,3 as smoke,4 as windspeed,5 as winddirection,6 as gyroscope ) --행으로 올릴 열 ) )
